metadata.title: CVE-2024-9631 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 13.6 prior to 17.2.9, starting from 17.3 prior to 17.3.5, and startingfrom 17.4 prior to 17.4.2, where viewing diffs of MR with conflicts can beslow.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
